subject: Basketball
College Athletics
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Bryce Cotton and Kadeem Batts each scored 27 points and host Providence made Louisville Coach Rick Pitino’s night miserable on a day the school honored his 1987 Friars squad.
snippet: Bryce Cotton and Kadeem Batts each scored 27 points and host Providence made Louisville Coach Rick Pitino’s night miserable on a day the school honored his 1987 Friars squad.
